attributes.action: Revoke the UK Government's support of Israel's policies and actions.
attributes.additional_details: The UK, as a permanent member of the UN Security Council and a signatory to numerous international conventions and treaties, has a responsibility to uphold human rights and the principles enshrined in the UN Charter. The ongoing Israeli occupation of Palestinian territories, the construction of settlements in violation of international law, and the cutting of essential supplies like water, food, electricity, fuel, and medicine, have exacerbated the humanitarian crisis in Palestine.
attributes.background: We call upon the UK government to embody true democratic values by faithfully reflecting the views of its citizens. It is essential for the government to reassess its endorsement of Israel and unequivocally denounce Israel's policies, actions and illegal occupation of Palestine.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648225
